game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.beginning: In a world where time has lost all meaning, humanity teeters on the brink of extinction. The once-blue skies have turned to ash, and the few remaining settlements struggle to survive amidst the ruins.
game.ending: As the last remnants of society fade into memory, the player's quest for answers becomes an odyssey of discovery and sacrifice. Will they unravel the mysteries behind the universe's descent into darkness, or succumb to the void?
game.synopsis: In Echoes of Eternity, players take on the role of a time traveler tasked with restoring balance to a shattered cosmos. Guided by ancient artifacts and cryptic visions, they embark on a perilous journey across disparate eras, forging unlikely alliances and unraveling the threads of a catastrophic event known only as 'The Great Dissonance'. With each step, the boundaries between past and future blur, threatening to rewrite the fabric of reality itself. Can the player's determination reignite the flame of hope in a desolate universe, or will the echoes of eternity forever silence the voice of humanity?
